content: **pattern information** a simple beginner friendly top knitted with pearly haze for a soft and shiny look the top is worked from the bottom up on circular needles pearly top has a negative easy approx 5-10 cm if you want a looser fit choose the size that matches your bust circumference **size** xs s m l xl 2xl **measurements** length 44 46 48 50 52 54 cm / 17 3 18 1 18 9 19 6 20 5 21 2 ″ circumference 75 82 90 98 106 112 cm / 29 5 31 2 35 4 38 4 41 7 44 ″ arrmhole height 20 21 23 24 25 26 cm / 7 9 8 3 9 9 4 9 8 10 2 ″
